comments.comments_text: Georgios Donis (Maccabi Tel Aviv) gets a yellow card after the final whistle for unsporting behaviour.

comments.comments_text: Georgios Donis (Maccabi Tel Aviv) picks up a yellow card for unsporting behaviour after the half-time whistle. He should have gone straight into the dressing room instead.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) picks up a yellow card for unsporting behaviour after the half-time whistle. He should have gone straight into the dressing room instead.

comments.comments_text: Patson Daka (Salzburg) is the lucky recipient of a rebound. He takes advantage of it and powers the ball into the bottom left corner of the target, leaving the goalkeeper completely helpless.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is the lucky recipient of a rebound. He takes advantage of it and powers the ball into the bottom left corner of the target, leaving the goalkeeper completely helpless.

comments.comments_text: Maximilian Wober (Salzburg) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat. Salzburg have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Dominik Szoboszlai (Salzburg) is heading toward the corner flag to take the set piece.

comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Eden Karzev (Maccabi Tel Aviv) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a great shot into the bottom right corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of Cican Stankovic, so the score changes to 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Mohamed Camara (Salzburg) has tested the patience of referee Felix Brych and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: Dan Biton (Maccabi Tel Aviv) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.

comments.comments_text: Eden Karzev (Maccabi Tel Aviv) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Felix Brych had an easy-decision to make.

comments.comments_text: Although Georgios Donis (Maccabi Tel Aviv) is just on the bench, Felix Brych has awarded him with a yellow card. Unsporting behavior says the referee.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Although [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is just on the bench, [REFEREE] has awarded him with a yellow card. Unsporting behavior says the referee.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Matan Baltaksa (Maccabi Tel Aviv) was quite harsh and Felix Brych didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Matan Baltaksa ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Georgios Donis almost immediately gets a second yellow card from referee Felix Brych and will have to vacate the bench!

comments.comments_text: Goal! Dominik Szoboszlai (Salzburg) puts the ball into the left side of the goal past the outstretched arm of Daniel.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Patson Daka (Salzburg) makes it 3:1. He jumped highest to connect with a perfect cross from Albert Vallci and planted his close-range header into the right side of the goal. Daniel was helpless.
